segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while everything is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s drying a plate like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her because she’s going to have a huge mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s tired or just really focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and she won’t even see it happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a sad scene because no one is paying attention to what matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she deserves better than this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just going to keep flowing until someone stops it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she looks up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
